description.html: I Am experienced in leveraging agile frameworks to provide a robust synopsis for high level overviews. Iterative approaches to corporate strategy foster collaborative thinking to further the overall value proposition.

right_column_text.html:
• Successfully completed the React JS course. Practical Course 2020 (incl. Hooks, Classes, Redux) 05/13/2020 from teacher Vladilen Minin on Udemy.
  • Successfully completed the course Full course on JavaScript + React - from scratch to the result 11/14/2020 from the teacher Ivan Petrichenko on Udemy.
  • Successfully completed the Node JS course. Practical course. (Mongo, GraphQL, MySQL, Express) 06/14/2020 from teacher Vladilen Minin on Udemy.
  • 2 st Place - Dan.it education High School - Hackathon 2020
  • 2 nd Place - Zhytomyr High School - Web Design 2011
